issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Unsupported GROUP BY for Timestamp(Millisecond, None)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12028](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12028). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Running a GROUP BY query on a column of type Timestamp(Millisecond, ...) does not work as the case is not implemented in hash_aggregate.rs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12028?focusedCommentId=17312580) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9773
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9773>
